Package com.mindalliance.configuration

This package contains the BrowserController, Configuration, DataController, ElementController, GlobalVariables, Reporting and UIActions class.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrowserController
    Creates the appropriate browser instance and set the Webdriver of browser.
    Configuration
    The Singleton Configuration class contains all the variables that are used throughout the application, and their getter/setter methods.
    DataController
    The DataLocators class contains the methods for manipulating data such as reading test data from CSV file which we can use throughout the application.
    ElementController
    The ElementController class contains the methods to find element on Web page and wait until the element is not found.
    GlobalVariables
    This class is used to access the object of the Configuration(SingleTon) class throughout the application.
    Log4J  
    LogFunctions
    This function write logs,result and get system time
    Reporting
    The Reporting class contains all the reporting related methods which are helpful for analyzing the results of the test case.
    UIActions
    The UIActions class contains all the methods that deal with some action being performed in the UI throughout the application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Configuration.TraceLevel  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UIAutomationException  

Package com.mindalliance.configuration Description

This package contains the BrowserController, Configuration, DataController, ElementController, GlobalVariables, Reporting and UIActions class. The package deals with methods and variables which are used throughout the automation application.
Author:
AFourTech
